alert.note: Alert for Telfair (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Telfair County through 330 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Lumber City, or 9 miles west of Hazlehurst, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lumber City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
